titles.title: O Thou In Whose Presence (easy, word timing aw

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Thou in whose presence My soul takes delight On whom in affliction I call My comfort by day And my song in the night My hope my salvation my all{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Where dost Thou dear Shepherd Resort with Thy sheep To feed them in pastures of love Say why in the valley Of death should I weep Or alone in this wilderness rove{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O why should I wander An alien from Thee Or cry in the desert For bread Thy foes will rejoice When my sorrows they see And smile at the tears I have shed{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Restore my Savior The light of Thy face Thy soul-cheering comfort impart And let the sweet tokens Of pardoning grace Bring joy to my desolate heart{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ye daughters of Zion declare Have you seen the star That on Israel shone Say if in your tents My beloved has been And where with His flocks He is gone{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dear Shepherd I hear And will follow Thy call I know the sweet sound of Thy voice Restore and defend me For Thou art my all And in Thee I will ever rejoice{/lang-eng}
